description: black; rectangular in shape with central section rising up; silver dial; red, rectangular disconnect bar; black cloth cord attaches to handset and another cord to attach to wall
text: "Red Bar" is the popular name given to this telephone with its streamline styling and its striking red disconnect bar element (visible only when the receiver is lifted).  Its heft and muscularity were the perfect match for "serious business."
title: "Red Bar" series 1000 rotary-dial telephone
